artist: Artist: Migita Toshihide; Publisher: Akiyama Buemon
creditline: Gift from the collection of Edith and the late John Payne
description: vertical ōban triptych; soldier in green uniform with a wrapped head wound on right, on ground; soldier in black jacket stands behind wounded soldier, PL hand on wounded soldier's shoulder; sword on ground in center; trees in center; crouching soldier in green uniform holding a rifle on left
inscription: on left sheet, on back, in LLC, in pencil: RD0206128
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
portfolio: From Records of the Hostilities between Japan and Russia (Nichiro kōsen kibun 日露交戰紀聞)
title: Infantry Second Lieutenant Ueda Kan
